fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Education and training, Youth, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: EU4Innovation Horizon 2020 Education Science Technology Innovation Armenia University DG Near
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: At TUMO Center for Creative Technologies, technology and art merge to provide teens everything they need to give them a competitive edge in a digital world. Thousands of students gather at the center where they have all the tools and resources to develop the skills they need to succeed in their future. With access to state of the art technology and the chance to learn directly from some of the world's leading professionals in web design, robotics, animation, film and much more, TUMO teens are encouraged to tap into their entrepreneurial intuitions to create and expand the boundaries of today's cutting edge industries.
